730230.name: Sniper Rust VR Demo
730230.description:
Sniper Rust VR -Trial Version presents one of the 18 chapters from the full version, a virtual reality adventure set against an armed militia uprising across international borders.

As the Agency’s most-skilled hired gun, players are called to put their sniping skills to the test in a first-person.



  • Cutting-edge Weaponry : Stalk your prey with one of the lethal firearms, pre-unlocked and crafted with attention to detail for an immersive VR experience.

  • Death-Dealing enemy troops: Diverse enemy classes make every playable mission a challenge; be wary of well-concealed snipers, air/group assaults behind enemy lines.

  • Orchestral auditory feedback : A John Leonard French soundtrack to please even the world’s best sharpshooter.
